title: Customer Fields

fields.label: Card Title
fields.name: customer_card_title
fields.instructions: Title displayed on the customer card. The post title is used for backend naming only.

fields.label: Hero Image
fields.name: customer_hero_image
fields.instructions: Background image displayed on the customer card.

fields.label: Company Name
fields.name: customer_company_name
fields.instructions: Name of the customer company. Used if no company logo is provided.

fields.label: Company Logo
fields.name: customer_logo
fields.instructions: Customer company logo. If provided, this will be used instead of company name.

fields.label: Type
fields.name: customer_type
fields.instructions: Type or tag displayed on the customer card (e.g., 'Case Study', 'Success Story').

fields.label: Industry
fields.name: customer_industry_taxonomy
fields.instructions: Select the industry or industries for this customer.

fields.label: Asset 1 Title
fields.name: customer_asset_1_title
fields.instructions: Title for the first asset link displayed on the customer card.

fields.label: Asset 1 CTA Text
fields.name: customer_asset_1_cta
fields.instructions: Call-to-action text for the first asset link (e.g., 'Watch Now', 'Read Now').

fields.label: Asset 1 URL
fields.name: customer_asset_1_url
fields.instructions: URL for the first asset link.

fields.label: Asset 2 Title
fields.name: customer_asset_2_title
fields.instructions: Title for the second asset link displayed on the customer card.

fields.label: Asset 2 CTA Text
fields.name: customer_asset_2_cta
fields.instructions: Call-to-action text for the second asset link (e.g., 'Watch Now', 'Read Now').

fields.label: Asset 2 URL
fields.name: customer_asset_2_url
fields.instructions: URL for the second asset link.

description: Additional fields for customers including company name, industry taxonomy, logo, and asset links.
